name: BodyBuilding Simple Forum
description:
Simplifies the BodyBuilding.com forums, removes side bar and other unneeded features.
Future versions might have different color themes/customizable style settings.
Currently only supported under the normal/white+blue BB.com forum-theme.

Made by BB.com user cheesecake93. 

Enjoy!
additional_info: Version 1.0 released 4/1/14: Same color theme, with minimal interface.
